name: URuntimeVirtualTextureComponent
doc: Component used to place a URuntimeVirtualTexture in the world.

BoundsAlignActor: Actor to align rotation to. If set this actor is always included in the bounds calculation.
bSnapBoundsToLandscape: If the Bounds Align Actor is a Landscape then this will snap the bounds so that virtual texture texels align with landscape vertex positions.
ExpandBounds: Amount to expand the Bounds during calculation.
VirtualTexture: The virtual texture object to use.
EnableInGamePerPlatform: Per platform overrides for enabling the virtual texture. Only affects In-Game and PIE.
bEnableForNaniteOnly: Enable the virtual texture only when Nanite is enabled. Can be used for a Displacement virtual texture with Nanite tessellation.
bEnableScalability: Set to true to enable scalability settings for the virtual texture.
ScalabilityGroup: Group index of the scalability settings to use for the virtual texture.
bHidePrimitives: Hide primitives in the main pass. Hidden primitives will be those that draw to this virtual texture with 'Draw in Main Pass' set to 'From Virtual Texture'.
StreamingTexture: Texture object containing streamed low mips. This can reduce rendering update cost.
StreamLowMips: Number of streaming low mips to build for the virtual texture.
LossyCompressionAmount:
How aggressively should any relevant lossy compression be applied.
For compressors that support EncodeSpeed (i.e. Oodle), this is only applied if enabled (see Project Settings -> Texture Encoding).
Note that this is in addition to any unavoidable loss due to the target format. Selecting "No Lossy Compression" will not result in zero distortion for BCn formats.
bUseStreamingMipsFixedColor: Build the streaming low mips using a fixed color.
StreamingMipsFixedColor: Fixed color to use when building the streaming low mips. This only affects BaseColor and Displacement attributes. The Red channel is used for fixed Displacement.
bUseStreamingLowMipsInEditor: Use streaming low mips when rendering in editor. Set true to view and debug the baked streaming low mips.

methods.name: Invalidate
methods.doc:
This function marks an area of the runtime virtual texture as dirty.
@param WorldBounds : The world space bounds of the pages to invalidate.
